SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 5.4.1: Proportion of time spent on unpaid domestic and care work, by sex, age and location
STAT_CONC_DEF: This indicator is defined as the proportion of time spent in a day on unpaid domestic and care work by men and women. Unpaid domestic and care work refers to activities related to the provision of services for own final use by household members, or by family members living in other households. These activities are listed in ICATUS 2016 under the major divisions “3. Unpaid domestic services for household and family members” and “4. Unpaid caregiving services for household and family members”.
DATA_COMP: The average time spent on an activity is a daily average based on a seven day week and the proportion of day is based on a 24 hour day.
